alert.note: Alert for Nicholas; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 12:21PM EST until March 10 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Licking River at Blue Licks Spring affecting Robertson and Nicholas Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO THURSDAY MORNING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is expected. * WHERE...Licking River at Blue Licks Spring. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Cropland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM EST Monday the stage was 24.5 feet and quickly rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to minor flood stage. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued if the forecast changes.
